p:
Our analysis estimated that mean HAI antibody titers remained ≥40 until 22 months after illness onset. Ma et al. reported that HAI GMTs declined to lower than 40 at 10 months after illness onset.
20 However, they used a 2013 human A(H7N9) virus isolate to test serum samples from patients from the 2016–2017 epidemic, which might result in an underestimate of antibody titers. In another cross-sectional study, Ma et al. reported that HAI GMT was near 40 at about 26 months after illness onset, which was similar to our findings.
21
